timeline.message:
[core] Ignore HubInstrumentedTest#multiplePublications

This test is flakey, and frequently fails. Further effort will be
required to determine a root cause. Meanwhile, we would like to bulid a
consistent baseline of passing tests, from which we can build.

timeline.author: jpignata
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -140,6 +141,7 @@ public void noSubscriptionReceivedAfterUnsubscribe() throws InterruptedException
      * @throws InterruptedException when waiting for CountDownLatch to
      *                              meet the desired condition is interrupted.
      */
+    @Ignore("This test doest not pass reliably and warrants further investigration.")
